about_the_game:
Bullet Grinder Grab your trusty cannon and bring lead rain to your enemies! Blast your way through hordes of robots in this hardcore platforming game if you hesitate. You will have to bring order to these parts by destroying all the bloodthirsty robots. But not only opponents should be feared - deep chasms and dangerous traps can await you on your way. Will you be able to overcome all the deadly levels and get to the very end?
Bullet Grinder is a 2D platformer, you play as a newly minted fighter against alien invaders, you have a submachine gun, find all the keys and open a pandora's box to get super weapons and overthrow the invaders.

Peculiarities:
- Nice graphics
- Nice soundtrack By QUE Sounds

name: Bullet Grinder

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1030
  • Storage: 80 MB available space

short_description: Bullet Grinder - Pick up your trusty cannon and make your enemies rain lead! Blast your way through hordes of robots in this hardcore platforming game that will kill you in no time if you hesitate
